organization.name: Kyros Digital LLC
organization.description: A business demonstrating an ontology for organizational structure, roles, workflows, integrations, data sources, AI/ML, analytics, and tools.

notes.content: Organization structure updated to reflect new departments
notes.author: John Doe

departments.name: Human Resources
departments.description: Oversees employee recruitment, benefits, and compliance.

departments.name: Finance
departments.description: Manages financial planning, accounting, and budgeting.

departments.name: Information Technology
departments.description: Provides technical support and manages IT infrastructure.

departments.name: Operations
departments.description: Ensures efficient business processes and logistics.

softwareTools.name: Salesforce
softwareTools.description: CRM tool used for managing customer relationships and sales data.

departments.name: Sales
departments.description: Handles sales operations and customer outreach.

roles.name: Sales Manager
roles.responsibilities: Oversees sales strategy and manages the sales team.

roles.name: Sales Associate
roles.responsibilities: Engages with customers and supports sales activities.

roles.name: Customer Support Agent
roles.responsibilities: Handles customer inquiries and support tickets.

processes.name: Lead Conversion Process
processes.description: A process for converting leads into customers, involving sales and marketing.

workflow.name: Initial Outreach
workflow.description: Contact the lead within 24 hours of their inquiry.

notes.content: Department restructured to improve lead conversion workflow
notes.author: Jane Smith

analytics.name: Sales Performance Analytics
analytics.description: Analyzes sales team performance metrics and KPIs.

aiComponents.name: Customer Sentiment Analysis
aiComponents.description: Analyzes customer communications to detect sentiment and flag issues.

departments.name: Marketing
departments.description: Handles marketing activities and customer engagement.

roles.name: Marketing Manager
roles.responsibilities: Develops marketing strategies and oversees the marketing team.

softwareTools.name: HubSpot
softwareTools.description: Marketing automation tool used by the Marketing department.
